programme.desc: Buailfidh Mary Kennedy le daoine atá anois ag cur fúthu i gCo. Liatroma. (In the final episode of the series, Mary Kennedy visits movers west to lovely Leitrim.)

programme.title: Comhrá
programme.desc: Is é Petie Kelly a bheidh ag comhrá le Máirtín Tom Sheáinín ar an gclár. (Máirtín Tom Sheáinín chats with Petie Kelly on the show.)

programme.title: Beidh Aonach Amárach
programme.desc: Sa chlár seo rachaimid ag siúl ar phortaigh Chonamara agus ar bhóithríní Fhear Manach. (In this programme we walk across the bogs in Connemara to country laneways in Fermanagh.)

programme.title: Paisean Faisean
programme.desc: Is í Katie Burke a bheidh na buachaillí ag iarraidh a mhealladh le héadaí deasa. (The boys will try to woo Katie Burke with lovely outfits.)

programme.title: France 24
programme.desc: Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha Speisialta
programme.desc: Caithfidh na Blocuimhreacha dul sa tóir ar thaisce an Chaptaen Heicsea-Fhéasóg! (The Numberblocks must seek Captain Hexabeard's treasure.)

programme.title: Garáiste Gecko
programme.desc: Tá Gecko tinn agus caithfidh na meicneoirí eile an obair a dhéanamh. (The other mechanics must cover for Gecko when he's sick.)

programme.title: Bíp Bíp Cory Carson
programme.desc: Déanann Cory a mhíle dícheall pluid Chrissy a aimsiú. (Cory tries his level best to find Chrissy's blanky.)

programme.title: Balloon Barnyard
programme.desc: Inniu Lá na Rásaí i gClós na mBalún ach tá na bainbh ag briseadh na rialacha. (It's Race Day at Balloon Barnyard, but the piglets are breaking the rules.)

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: Tá Mamó agus Timmy le dealbh cloiche a dhéanamh ach meas tú an bhfuil fios a ngnó acu? (Grandma and Timmy plan to carve a scuplture out of stone.)

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: Caithfidh Elmo, Abby agus Cookie maisiúcháin nua Nollag a dhéanamh le cur ar an gcrann. (The Mechas must build new ornaments for the tree and save the holidays.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Déanann gaireas nua Romeo diabhailíní d'Owlette agus de Catboy. (Romeo's newest device turns Owlette and Catboy into villains.)

programme.title: Finny an Siorc
programme.desc: Tá Finny agus a cuid cairde ag iarraidh dráma a chur ar siúl faoin múinteoir. (Finny's class is making a play about their teacher, Mr. Magellan.)

programme.title: Igam Ogam
programme.desc: Ba mhaith le Igam Ogam go mbeadh a cuid cairde ar fad salach. (Igam Ogam tries to get her playmates dirty.)

programme.title: Baile Beag Draíochtúil Pinocchio
programme.desc: Imríonn Pinocchio cleas ar na Banphrionsaí Jodelle agus Neantóg. (Pinocchio plays a trick on Princesses Jodelle and Neantóg.)

programme.title: Baile Beag Draíochtúil Pinocchio
programme.desc: Caithfidh Pinocchio agus Conal Mór cleite ulchabháin a aimsiú. (Pinocchio and Buaiceasaín are challenged to get an owl's feather.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Is breá le Lola a bheith ag tabhairt aire do chat Mhamó agus Dhaideo. (Lola loves looking after Granny and Grandpa's cat Caspar.)

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Tagann Lola ar bhréagán ar scoil agus níl a fhios aici ar cheart di é a choinneáil. (Lola finds someone else's toy at school and isn't sure if she should keep it or not.)

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Níl tada le déanamh ag Charlie agus Lola ó tharla go bhfuil sé ag cur báistí. (It's raining outside, and Charlie and Lola have nothing to do.)

programme.title: That's Joey
programme.desc: Cé nach bhfuil ach lá amháin fanta go dtí laethanta saoire Iníon Uí Thuama, tá an-strus uirthi ar chúis éigin. (For some reason the teacher seems very stressed.)

programme.title: That's Joey
programme.desc: Téann Joey ar cuairt chuig Olive chun go gcabhróidh sí leis lena chuid obair bhaile. (Joey goes to Olive's house so she can help him with his homework.)

programme.title: Club Airéine
programme.desc: Is iad na páistí ó Chumann Lúthchleasaíochta Chathair Chill Chainnigh a bheidh linn an tseachtain seo. (This week, we're with the kids from Kilkenny City Harriers Athletics Club.)

programme.title: Campa Fiáin

programme.title: Scannán: The Glenn Miller Story
programme.desc: Scéal beatha Glenn Miller ó thús a shaoil go dtí a bhás mí na Nollag 1944. (Biography of Glenn Miller from his beginnings to his death over the English Channel in December 1944.)

programme.title: Buildings Beo
programme.desc: Tugann Carrie aghaidh ar Mhaigh Chromtha i gCo. Chorcaí go bhfeicfidh sí seanamharclann á cóirú. (Carrie visits Macroom, Co. Cork to see a beloved theatre being restored.)

programme.title: Scannán: Shrek 2
